titles.title: An original resolution relative to expenditures by the Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Inouye. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 100-120.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 249.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/15/1987--Introduced. Increases authorized expenditures for the Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs for the period March 1, 1986, through February 28, 1987, and decreases authorized expenditures for the period from March 1, 1987, through February 29, 1988.
